NPatchDomContentFromImage.Arg: var b = collection.toBounds($box, $widgetBounds, $handle1, $handle2); new Dimension(b.w, b.h);

Property.name: text
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'text', bound: collection.toBounds($box, $textBounds), font: $textFont, align: $textAlignment, richText: true})

html:div.style: width: 20px; height: 20px; position: absolute; top: 0px; left: 0px;

Shortcut.PropertyValue: Minantia  mutastis peragebant est sine duae cesserunt dicere elementaque exemit adspirate finxit fidem sua aliis.
